entry.name: RavenGuard/Apothecary:Attack#0
entry.value: These don't only heal.

entry.name: RavenGuard/Apothecary:Broken#0
entry.value: I cannot leave the gene-seed!

entry.name: RavenGuard/Apothecary:Hurt#0
entry.value: Patching myself up.

entry.name: RavenGuard/Apothecary:Idle#0
entry.value: Apothecary on call.

entry.name: RavenGuard/Apothecary:Idle#1
entry.value: Docs don't need downtime.

entry.name: RavenGuard/Apothecary:Idle#2
entry.value: Reductor practise.

entry.name: RavenGuard/Apothecary:Idle#3
entry.value: The progenoid's connected to the Betchers and the Sus-an…

entry.name: RavenGuard/Apothecary:Shaken#0
entry.value: Good news! I'm not dead.

entry.name: RavenGuard/Apothecary:Victory#0
entry.value: They're dead! I'm not sure this is the best use of my time!

entry.name: RavenGuard/Captain:Attack#0
entry.value: Die happy scum, knowing you died at my hand!

entry.name: RavenGuard/Captain:Attack#1
entry.value: Eat boltgun.

entry.name: RavenGuard/Captain:Attack#2
entry.value: For the Emperor!

entry.name: RavenGuard/Captain:Attack#3
entry.value: You are facing a Space Marine captain. Surrender now, for a quick death.

entry.name: RavenGuard/Captain:Attack#4
entry.value: Corax awaits.

entry.name: RavenGuard/Captain:Attack#5
entry.value: My faith is my shield!

entry.name: RavenGuard/Captain:Broken#0
entry.value: Emperor preserve us!

entry.name: RavenGuard/Captain:Hurt#0
entry.value: I must focus…?

entry.name: RavenGuard/Captain:Idle#0
entry.value: I should be leading from the front.

entry.name: RavenGuard/Captain:Idle#1
entry.value: Inspirational speeches don't write themselves.

entry.name: RavenGuard/Captain:Idle#2
entry.value: We must save humanity from itself.

entry.name: RavenGuard/Captain:Idle#3
entry.value: Why here? Why Gladius? Are we being tested?

entry.name: RavenGuard/Captain:Shaken#0
entry.value: I bend to no-one!

entry.name: RavenGuard/Captain:Victory#0
entry.value: Thus fall all enemies of the Golden Throne!

entry.name: RavenGuard/AssaultCaptain:Attack#0
entry.value: Die happy scum, knowing you died at my hand!

entry.name: RavenGuard/AssaultCaptain:Attack#1
entry.value: Eat boltgun.

entry.name: RavenGuard/AssaultCaptain:Attack#2
entry.value: For the Emperor!

entry.name: RavenGuard/AssaultCaptain:Attack#3
entry.value: You are facing a Space Marine captain. Surrender now, for a quick death.

entry.name: RavenGuard/AssaultCaptain:Attack#4
entry.value: Corax awaits.

entry.name: RavenGuard/AssaultCaptain:Attack#5
entry.value: My faith is my shield!

entry.name: RavenGuard/AssaultCaptain:Broken#0
entry.value: Emperor preserve us!

entry.name: RavenGuard/AssaultCaptain:Hurt#0
entry.value: I must focus…?

entry.name: RavenGuard/AssaultCaptain:Idle#0
entry.value: I should be leading from the front.

entry.name: RavenGuard/AssaultCaptain:Idle#1
entry.value: Inspirational speeches don't write themselves.

entry.name: RavenGuard/AssaultCaptain:Idle#2
entry.value: We must save humanity from itself.

entry.name: RavenGuard/AssaultCaptain:Idle#3
entry.value: Why here? Why Gladius? Are we being tested?

entry.name: RavenGuard/AssaultCaptain:Shaken#0
entry.value: I bend to no-one!

entry.name: RavenGuard/AssaultCaptain:Victory#0
entry.value: Thus fall all enemies of the Golden Throne!

entry.name: RavenGuard/Chaplain:Attack#0
entry.value: Be blessed by the Crozius!

entry.name: RavenGuard/Chaplain:Attack#1
entry.value: I will make you believe!

entry.name: RavenGuard/Chaplain:Attack#2
entry.value: In nomine Imperator!

entry.name: RavenGuard/Chaplain:Broken#0
entry.value: Not one step back!

entry.name: RavenGuard/Chaplain:Hurt#0
entry.value: Though I suffer their blows, I shall not fall.

entry.name: RavenGuard/Chaplain:Idle#0
entry.value: Death has no terror save that our work will be incomplete.

entry.name: RavenGuard/Chaplain:Idle#1
entry.value: Give your life to the Emperor, it shall not be in vain.

entry.name: RavenGuard/Chaplain:Idle#2
entry.value: There is no peace whilst our foes live.

entry.name: RavenGuard/Chaplain:Idle#3
entry.value: We spit our defiance to the end.

entry.name: RavenGuard/Chaplain:Shaken#0
entry.value: For a warrior, the only crime is cowardice.

entry.name: RavenGuard/Chaplain:Victory#0
entry.value: Faith is stronger than adamantium.

entry.name: RavenGuard/Headquarters:Attack#0
entry.value: Break yourselves on our defences!

entry.name: RavenGuard/Headquarters:Attack#1
entry.value: Fools, to attack an Adeptus Astartes stronghold.

entry.name: RavenGuard/Headquarters:Attack#2
entry.value: Fortress Commander here. Firing.

entry.name: RavenGuard/Headquarters:Attack#3
entry.value: Why not try walking in the front door?

entry.name: RavenGuard/Headquarters:Broken#0
entry.value: Our Chapter will. NOT. Fall.

entry.name: RavenGuard/Headquarters:Hurt#0
entry.value: Fortress is breached, repeat Fortress is breached.

entry.name: RavenGuard/Headquarters:Idle#0
entry.value: All quiet on the home front.

entry.name: RavenGuard/Headquarters:Idle#1
entry.value: Commander, we're ready for anything.

entry.name: RavenGuard/Headquarters:Idle#2
entry.value: Litanies are being read in the Reclusiam.

entry.name: RavenGuard/Headquarters:Idle#3
entry.value: Serfs are hard at work.

entry.name: RavenGuard/Headquarters:Shaken#0
entry.value: Recall all the units to the Fortress!

entry.name: RavenGuard/Headquarters:Victory#0
entry.value: Invaders eliminated.

entry.name: RavenGuard/Librarian:Attack#0
entry.value: Let me gaze into your future… ah. It's short.

entry.name: RavenGuard/Librarian:Attack#1
entry.value: I have a gift. It would be churlish not to share it…

entry.name: RavenGuard/Librarian:Attack#2
entry.value: Snap go my fingers… snap go your bones.

entry.name: RavenGuard/Librarian:Broken#0
entry.value: I can hear the daemon, howling in my ears.

entry.name: RavenGuard/Librarian:Hurt#0
entry.value: Physical pain is nothing compared to eternal damnation.

entry.name: RavenGuard/Librarian:Idle#0
entry.value: Blessed is the mind too small for doubt.

entry.name: RavenGuard/Librarian:Idle#1
entry.value: The warp holds no fear for me.

entry.name: RavenGuard/Librarian:Idle#2
entry.value: The warp storm… sometimes the pain is nigh unbearable.

entry.name: RavenGuard/Librarian:Idle#3
entry.value: When this is over… the Librarium calls.

entry.name: RavenGuard/Librarian:Shaken#0
entry.value: The lore has nothing about this…

entry.name: RavenGuard/Librarian:Victory#0
entry.value: Their failure was foreseen.

entry.name: RavenGuard/TacticalSpaceMarine:Artefact#0
entry.value: What is that foul xenos device?

entry.name: RavenGuard/TacticalSpaceMarine:Attack#0
entry.value: Eat boltgun!

entry.name: RavenGuard/TacticalSpaceMarine:Attack#1
entry.value: Engaging the enemy!

entry.name: RavenGuard/TacticalSpaceMarine:Attack#2
entry.value: For the Chapter!

entry.name: RavenGuard/TacticalSpaceMarine:Attack#3
entry.value: I am your salvation!

entry.name: RavenGuard/TacticalSpaceMarine:Attack#4
entry.value: Space Marines, attack!

entry.name: RavenGuard/TacticalSpaceMarine:Attack#5
entry.value: Taste the Emperor's fury!

entry.name: RavenGuard/TacticalSpaceMarine:Attack#6
entry.value: We are the Shadowed Blades.

entry.name: RavenGuard/TacticalSpaceMarine:Attack#7
entry.value: Victorus aut Mortis!

entry.name: RavenGuard/TacticalSpaceMarine:Broken#0
entry.value: Fall back to the prepared defenses!

entry.name: RavenGuard/TacticalSpaceMarine:Broken#1
entry.value: Fight to the last marine!

entry.name: RavenGuard/TacticalSpaceMarine:Broken#2
entry.value: Preserve the gene-seed!

entry.name: RavenGuard/TacticalSpaceMarine:Broken#3
entry.value: We bring shame upon our Chapter!

entry.name: RavenGuard/TacticalSpaceMarine:Broken#4
entry.value: I miss Gene-dad…

entry.name: RavenGuard/TacticalSpaceMarine:Cover#0
entry.value: The Emperor protects those who protect themselves.

entry.name: RavenGuard/TacticalSpaceMarine:Hurt#0
entry.value: We will stand until the last Marine.

entry.name: RavenGuard/TacticalSpaceMarine:Hurt#1
entry.value: We… will… not… fall!

entry.name: RavenGuard/TacticalSpaceMarine:Hurt#2
entry.value: Victorus… aut… Mortis.

entry.name: RavenGuard/TacticalSpaceMarine:Idle#0
entry.value: Burn the heretic.

entry.name: RavenGuard/TacticalSpaceMarine:Idle#1
entry.value: Let them come….

entry.name: RavenGuard/TacticalSpaceMarine:Idle#2
entry.value: So many Xenos… so few bolts.

entry.name: RavenGuard/TacticalSpaceMarine:Idle#3
entry.value: We are the Sons of Corax.

entry.name: RavenGuard/TacticalSpaceMarine:Idle#4
entry.value: At the Commander's order.

entry.name: RavenGuard/TacticalSpaceMarine:Idle#5
entry.value: We must not meddle with these xenos artefacts.

entry.name: RavenGuard/TacticalSpaceMarine:Shaken#0
entry.value: …blessed is the mind too small for doubt.

entry.name: RavenGuard/TacticalSpaceMarine:Shaken#1
entry.value: Against this darkness, we shall prevail.

entry.name: RavenGuard/TacticalSpaceMarine:Shaken#2
entry.value: I am an unbreakable shield, forged against the darkness.

entry.name: RavenGuard/TacticalSpaceMarine:Shaken#3
entry.value: I believe in the Emperor!

entry.name: RavenGuard/TacticalSpaceMarine:Shaken#4
entry.value: Whilst our enemies draw breath, we cannot afford fear.

entry.name: RavenGuard/TacticalSpaceMarine:Victory#0
entry.value: All xenos and traitors are blights, to be cleansed from the galaxy.

entry.name: RavenGuard/TacticalSpaceMarine:Victory#1
entry.value: We fight, we prevail.

entry.name: RavenGuard/TacticalSpaceMarine:Victory#2
entry.value: Death at our hands is no dishonour.

entry.name: RavenGuard/TacticalSpaceMarine:Victory#3
entry.value: In the Emperor's name.

entry.name: RavenGuard/TacticalSpaceMarine:Victory#4
entry.value: My fist, clenched tight in ceramite, smashes with the force of a Chapter.

entry.name: RavenGuard/TacticalSpaceMarine:Victory#5
entry.value: So fall all enemies of the Imperium.

entry.name: RavenGuard/TacticalSpaceMarine:Victory#6
entry.value: Through the destruction of our enemies do we earn our salvation.

entry.name: RavenGuard/TacticalSpaceMarine:Victory#7
entry.value: We are the Emperor's vengeance, made flesh.
